plot: Two friends go out one night to a strip club, but when one guy slips a pill in the other's drink, all hell breaks loose. You see into the mind of someone when they're stoned and hallucinating. Enjoy. :D
title: Flipside
plot_es: Two friends go out one night to a strip club, but when one guy slips a pill in the other's drink, all hell breaks loose. You see into the mind of someone when they're stoned and hallucinating. Enjoy. :D
plot_en: Two friends go out one night to a strip club, but when one guy slips a pill in the other's drink, all hell breaks loose. You see into the mind of someone when they're stoned and hallucinating. Enjoy. :D
